Package no.ntnu.idatt1005.plate.controller.ui.mainviews

Class UiCookbookController

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatt1005.plate.controller.ui.mainviews.UiCookbookController
public class UiCookbookController extends Object
Controller class for the cookbook view in the GUI.
Version:
1.0
